allow: Bash(for test in test_function_body_complex test_functions_with_type_annotations test_malformed_function_definitions test_operator_precedence_errors test_edge_case_conditional_scenarios test_edge_case_operator_combinations)
Bash(timeout 3 cargo run --quiet -- eval "let countdown = fn(n ~ int) -> int { n }; countdown(5)")
Bash(RUST_BACKTRACE=1 ./target/debug/som eval "let countdown = fn(n ~ int) -> int { countdown(n - 1) }; countdown(5)")
